definition: thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal

sentences.english: The invention relates to a system and a method for manufacturing flakes of liquid-based cytology.
sentences.chinese: 本发明是关于一种液基细胞学制片系统以及制片方法。

sentences.english: There are obvious difference on morphology and cytology between polypoid and diploid .
sentences.chinese: 四倍体与二倍体在形态学和细胞学上有明显差异。

sentences.english: Treatment of asymptomatic women with trichomonads noted on liquid-based cervical cytology is recommended.
sentences.chinese: 宫颈细胞学检查发现滴虫的无症状患者建议用药治疗。

sentences.english: The patch clamp technique has become the main method for the molecule and cell research.
sentences.chinese: 膜片钳技术已成为分子和细胞学研究的重要手段。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the method of manufactures the high quality LCT fluid basal cell study flat and thin piece.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨如何制作优质的LCT液基细胞学片子。

sentences.english: Objective To explore clinical features of meninges carcinoma and cytologic changes of CSF.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨脑膜癌病的临床特征和脑脊液细胞学改变。

sentences.english: Cytological examination by fine-needle aspirate biopsy was helpful to diagnosis.
sentences.chinese: 针刺细胞学检查有助于甲状腺结核的诊断。

sentences.english: Objective:To analysis the cytologic examination by CT - guided percutaneous needle aspiration biopsy of the lung.
sentences.chinese: 分析CT引导下经皮肺穿刺细胞学检查结果。

sentences.english: Aspiration cytologic examination reealed a fibrocystic change.
sentences.chinese: 抽吸细胞学检查为纤维囊性变。

sentences.english: Demonstrate the techniques for preparing intraoperative cytology smears.
sentences.chinese: 掌握制备术中细胞学涂片的技术。

sentences.english: The experiment would provide cytological evidence for the early diagnosis of endometritis in dairy cows.
sentences.chinese: 平实验可为奶牛子宫内膜炎早期诊断提供细胞学依据。

sentences.english: Cytological study relieved that it was a diploid with 30chromosomes and its karyotype was 1A.
sentences.chinese: 细胞学研究发现，其染色体数为30，核型属1A型。

sentences.english: All epithelial lining appears benign cytologically.
sentences.chinese: 所有衬复上皮似乎细胞学良性。

sentences.english: The sperm basic proteins and cytology of fertilization in S. serrata were studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 研究锯缘青蟹精子碱性蛋白分布与受精细胞学。

sentences.english: Cytological observation of cytoplasmic male- sterile anther of brown cotton.
sentences.chinese: 棕色棉细胞质雄性不育花药的细胞学观察。
